Condor::

Condor decided, Astroblast didn't see his energon knife he took it 
and he also took one of his feathers.

If the bars did a discharge of energy he could use that to left the 
cell. 

Condor threw a large feather in that way that it touched two bars. He 
was ready to ran away.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:


> OOC: np =)
> 
> ::Switchblade::
> "Well what do you know, the big nasty bot, Skullgrin!" He shows 
> his Decepticon symbol, "I've heard some stuff about you back on 
> Cybertron, before I was shot off in a pod destined for here by my 
> enemies." He looks up at Skullgrin, who is quite taller that him, 
> "Show me around for a bit, I'd like to see the ship and hear who's 
> here. If there's a Decepticon Ship, then I bet there's more 
> Decepticons around somewhere." Switchblade looks at the ship, 
> "I'll bet that there are some nice comfy chairs in the control 
room, 
> hint hint." He says nudging Skullgrin with his elbow.
>
